授業目的: This course aims to guide students toward a comprehensive understanding of the lexical and functional properties of English verbs and constructions, by considering a number of major topics related to verbal aspects, information structure in the present-day English and grammaticalization in diachronic perspective.
到達目標:
Students who successfully complete this course will:
1. Demonstrate basic knowledge of English verb semantics and the relation between the verb meanings and verb behaviors.
2. Draw generalizations from a set of data; make an assumption to explain linguistic patterns and revise it properly when needed.
3. Argue for or against a view and lead discussions using objective and empirical evidence.
4. Formalize linguistic observations into simple rules and diagrams.
授業方法:
group discussion
individual presentation
English-medium instruction
